mapper.insert: insert into member (user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{count}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{status}, #{statusUpdateTime})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time from member where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time from member where email = #{email}
select id, user_id, password, name, email, phone, count, last_login_time, status, status_update_time from member where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update member set user_id = #{userId}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, count = #{count}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, status = #{status}, status_update_time = #{statusUpdateTime}
